full_text.1: Have a patient on suboxone for Opioid dependence and she’s had two scripts of Percocet in the past two weeks… doctors are dumb as hell I swear. Lmao
full_text.2:
#Naloxone is life-saving

It's used to reverse an opioid overdose.

Some kits have missing, or no needles at all.

Please check your kits and replace if needed.

If you don't have one, please get yourself a kit & keep with you at all times. You could save a life.

#RecoveryPosse https://t.co/l0jQDA10Au
